Package dist.hmm

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HiddenMarkovModel
    The abstraction of a hidden markov model
    StateDistribution
    An interface for state probalility functions that represent the probabilty of transitioning to a state and also the probability of starting in a state
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConditionalStateDistributionWrapper
    A wrapper class that turns a regular conditional distribution into a conditional state distribution (at some computational cost)
    ForwardBackwardProbabilityCalculator
    An implementation of the forward backward algorithm, which computes forward and backward probabilities for use in the Viterbi and Baum-Welch algorithms
    HiddenMarkovModelReestimator
    An implementation of the baum welch re estimation algorithm.
    ModularHiddenMarkovModel
    The abstract base class representing a hidden markov model
    SimpleHiddenMarkovModel
    A hidden markov model implementation that does not use observations when calculating transition probabilities and has no notion of input / output In terms of this implementation it is a HiddenMarkoModel that uses SimpleTransitionDistributions for it's TransitionDistributions
    SimpleStateDistribution
    A simple state functin doesn't look at the input observations at all when updating it's probabilities
    SimpleStateDistributionTable
    A look up table distribution for transitions
    StateSequenceCalculator
    A Viterbi algorithm implementation that uses log probabilities to prevent underflow.
